original_title: Ой горе, це ж гості до мене
overview: A touching cinematic portrait of a woman who survived the 1933 Holodomor and whose life comprised more dramatic moments than a screenwriter could possibly describe. This is one of the first films raising the issue of the Great Famine.

production_companies.name: Ukrainian News and Documentary Film Studio

title: Oh Dear, These Guests Have Come to Me
